attributes.action: abolish all taxes introduced to combat "Global Warming"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the fact that the scientific evidence for 'Global Warming' has been compromised at the least and refuted completely at the most, and that it is unproven that human beings are in any way responsible for climate change, to ask the Prime Minister to abolish all taxes introduced to combat "global warming".

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
